belongs_to_collection.name: The Six Million Dollar Man Movie Collection

original_title: The Six Million Dollar Man: Wine, Women and War
overview: After Col. Steve Austin fails to retrieve the contents of a safe owned by arms dealer Arlen Findletter, he takes up an friendly offer of a holiday in the Bahamas. There he runs into Soviet Agent Alexi Kaslov and his lovely assistant Katrina Volana, who also happen to be out to find Findletter. Is it a coincidence, or was Steve's trip all part of one of Oscar Goldman's missions?
title: The Six Million Dollar Man: Wine, Women and War
